subject: Re: B2B
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your message.

We are interested in your pedals and handbrakes, as well as your wheel base
products once they are available. It would also help us a lot if you could
let us know whether you offer a B2B platform or wholesale access, so that
we can view product details and pricing directly.

We do plan to keep some stock, but as we mentioned, since we are just
starting our business, we will not need large quantities at this stage.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,

conversations.body_text: Hi Vasilis Mamas,      Thank you very much for your message and for your interest in Simsonn! That sounds like a great project — congratulations on starting your new business in Greece.  Could you please let us know which products you are interested in and an approximate quantity for each? Once we have that information, we’ll prepare a quotation sheet for you based on the quantities.  Looking forward to your reply!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team
